document.full_text: uruguay's supreme court said on thursday that state-sponsored killings committed during the 1973-1985 dictatorship should be classed as murders rather than human rights crimes, drawing sharp criticism from rights activists.
document.title: uruguay rules state killings not human rights crimes
lines_and_colors: uruguay's supreme court said on thursday that state-sponsored killings committed during the 1973-1985 dictatorship should be classed as murders rather than human rights crimes, drawing sharp criticism from rights activists.
